paragraph.paragraph: The EiffelCOM Wizard allows the creation of Eiffel project implementing or reusing COM components.

list.item:
how_wizard_works.xml How the wizard works
describes the steps followed by the wizard when creating the Eiffel project.

eiffel_project.xml Adding a COM interface to an Eiffel project
covers how to add a COM interface to an existing EiffelStudio project.

generated_files.xml Generated Files
describes the list of generated files and their usage.
class_hierarchy.xml Class Hierarchy describes the class hierarchy of the generated Eiffel project.
accessing.xml Accessing a Component describes how to reuse an existing COM component.
building.xml Building a Component describes how to build a new COM component.
